sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tāmen jiāowǎng le liǎng nián.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ils sortent ensemble depuis deux ans.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: They have been dating for two years.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng yào yī bēi kělè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je voudrais un verre de coca.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I would like a glass of cola.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他在这家公司工作了将近十年。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài zhè jiā gōngsī gōngzuò le jiāngjìn shí nián.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il travaille dans cette entreprise depuis près de dix ans.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has worked at this company for nearly ten years.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Māo zhuāzhù le yī zhī lǎoshǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le chat a attrapé une souris.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The cat caught a mouse.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 请告诉我去那里的路线。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gàosu wǒ qù nàlǐ de lùxiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez m'indiquer l'itinéraire pour y aller.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please tell me the route to get there.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège xiàngmù yóu tā fùzé.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce projet est sous sa responsabilité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This project is his responsibility.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lǎoshī zài hēibǎn shàng xiězì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le professeur écrit au tableau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The teacher writes on the blackboard.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lǎoshī pīpíng le tā de cuòwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le professeur a critiqué son erreur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The teacher criticized his mistake.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā duì xiězuò hěn gǎn xìngqù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il s'intéresse beaucoup à l'écriture.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is very interested in writing.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn yīfu yào wǔshí měiyuán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce vêtement coûte cinquante dollars.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This piece of clothing costs fifty dollars.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì shénme páizi de shǒujī?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: De quelle marque est ce téléphone ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What brand is this phone?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měitiān zǎoshang pǎobù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je cours tous les matins.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I run every morning.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ xíngli fàng zài zhèlǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez mettre vos bagages ici.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please put your luggage here.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen xūyào gèng duō de jiāoliú.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous avons besoin de plus de communication.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We need more communication.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这是一个重要的历史事件。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè zhòngyào de lìshǐ shìjiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un événement historique important.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is an important historical event.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shíyóu shì zhòngyào de néngyuán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le pétrole est une source d'énergie importante.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Oil is an important energy source.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yuǎnchù chuánlái le yīnyuè shēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: De la musique s'est fait entendre au loin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Music came from the distance.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì wǒmen de jítǐ zhàopiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est notre photo de groupe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is our group photo.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bǎo'ān zài ménkǒu jiǎnchá zhèngjiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le gardien vérifie les pièces d'identité à l'entrée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The security guard checks IDs at the entrance.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 飞行时间大约两个小时。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Fēixíng shíjiān dàyuē liǎng gè xiǎoshí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le temps de vol est d'environ deux heures.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The flight time is about two hours.
